name: Hotel Manibella
description:
Welcome to Hotel Manibella, the ultimate horror puzzle game that will leave you trembling with fear and excitement! Step inside the doors of this eerie hotel and prepare to be transported to a world of terror and mystery.

As you make your way through the dimly lit hallways, you'll encounter all sorts of creepy creatures and spine-tingling puzzles. Each floor of the hotel brings new challenges and scares, and the deeper you go, the more intense the horror becomes.

But don't worry, you're not alone in this terrifying journey. You'll have to use your wits and skills to uncover the secret storyline behind the hotel's dark history and find a way out before it's too late.

What sets Hotel Manibella apart from other horror games is its unique art style, which perfectly captures the unsettling atmosphere of the hotel. Every detail, from the creaking floors to the ghastly monsters, has been meticulously crafted to give you an immersive and unforgettable horror experience.

So if you're looking for a truly spine-chilling adventure, Hotel Manibella is the game for you. Buy it now and brace yourself for a journey into the unknown. But be warned, once you enter the doors of this hotel, there's no turning back!

Initially, you find yourself confined in a room. Upon successfully escaping the first room, you advance to the next level by means of an elevator. In the subsequent level of the building, you must navigate through a maze to elude another monster. The pattern repeats in the following levels where you must also evade a monster and continue to progress.
